backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor defining MenuItem and Order types, a default menu of 72+ items, and core backend logic for menu management and order processing with helper comparison modules.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal migration module that defines old/new actor shapes and a no-op `run` function for state migration between deployments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the menu-load fix (backend `getMenuItems` + frontend handling) to specific files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing each component, hook, and utility's purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS with OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, chart, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Café Billing & Menu Manager' that mounts the React app at `#root` via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining routes for `/menu`, `/order`, `/bill`, and `/reports` under a shared `AppLayout`, with a root redirect from `/` to `/menu`.
frontend/src/components/bill/BillItemsTa: Renders a receipt-style table of order items showing name, quantity, unit price, and line total using `formatCurrency`.
Print-optimized receipt layout displaying the café logo, date/time, order number, items table, subtotal, optional discount, and total — with no tax row.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App shell with a sticky header showing the café logo and name, a scrollable main content outlet, and conditional bottom navigation hidden on the bill page.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Fixed bottom tab bar with Menu, Order, and Reports tabs, highlighting the active route with icon and background styling.
frontend/src/components/menu/DeleteMenuI: AlertDialog confirmation component for deleting a menu item, showing the item name and a loading state on the destructive confirm button.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuCategor: Renders a list of menu items grouped under a category, with inline edit (dialog) and delete actions for each item.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemFor: Reusable form component for creating or editing a menu item, supporting preset and custom categories with validation.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuCatego: Collapsible accordion component that displays menu items under a category heading for use in the order-taking UI.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuItemCa: Card component representing a single menu item with its price and an add button, showing current order quantity as a badge.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderItemR: Row component for an active order item showing quantity controls, line total, and a remove button.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderSumma: Scrollable panel listing all active order items using OrderItemRow, with an empty-state placeholder when no items are added.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderTotal: Displays order subtotal, a flat/percentage discount input, and the final total for the current order.
frontend/src/components/reports/DailySum: Shows two stat cards for today's revenue and items sold, with a loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateRang: UI component with two date inputs and an apply button for filtering reports by a date range.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateWise: Table component that groups orders by day and displays date, order count, and revenue for each day in the selected range.
frontend/src/components/reports/ItemWise: Renders a table card showing per-item sales data (name, quantity, revenue) with loading skeleton and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderState.ts: Custom hook managing active order state including items, discount (flat or percentage), and computed subtotal/discount/total values with add, update, and remove item callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating menu items and orders against the ICP backend actor, including category grouping/sorting utilities and menu seeding logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a warm café-themed design system with OKLCH CSS custom properties for light/dark modes, typography, scrollbar styling, tap targets, and print styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class name merging, currency formatting (number and bigint), date/datetime formatting from ICP nanosecond timestamps, and date range helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/BillView.tsx: Page component that reads bill data from sessionStorage and displays a printable bill layout with print and new-order action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/MenuManagement.tsx: React page for managing menu items, supporting add/edit/delete operations with auto-seeding of default menu when empty, and rendering items grouped by sorted categories.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTaking.tsx: React page for creating new orders by browsing menu categories, managing cart state, applying discounts, and finalizing orders before navigating to the bill page.
frontend/src/pages/SalesReports.tsx: React page displaying sales reports with today's summary, item-wise all-time sales, and date-wise history filtered by a configurable date range.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors, fonts, border radii, shadows, animations) using OKLCH variables, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version, existing features, and a known issue where the menu fails to load on the Menu Management page (fix request).
